sources.title: Day of the Gun | Full Western Movie | Eric Roberts
sources.description:
Day of the Gun - Set in 1890's Montana, a conflict between the widowed Maggie Carter and cattle baron Cyrus McCall escalates into a 'range war' when McCall threatens her survival as a rancher by putting up a barbed-wire fence. The battle escalates when their children get involved and a mysterious stranger from Maggie's past comes back into her life.
2013 Stars: Eric Roberts, Raw LeibaLa, Don Hart Hall

metadata.Plot: An ambitious widow vows "There will be hell to pay" when a prominent Montana rancher puts up a barbed wire fence between their properties.
metadata.Actors: Eric Roberts, Raw Leiba, LaDon Hart Hall
